0.user_question: Maria picked 48 carrots from her garden. If she threw out 11 of them and then picked 15 more the next day, how many carrots would she have total?

ost_step.1: Start with the number of carrots Maria picked the first time. She picked 48 carrots.
ost_step.2: Subtract the number of carrots she threw out from the initial number. She threw out 11 carrots. So, she has 48 - 11 = 37 carrots left.
ost_step.3: Add the number of carrots she picked the next day. She picked 15 more carrots. So, she has 37 (remaining carrots after throwing some out) + 15 (carrots picked the next day) = 52 carrots in total.
